post.description: Gets a list of participants in a challenge, ordered by points, grouped by ranks(same number of points) they belong to, with the current client as the center of the list. After the initial load the user can then scroll up and down the list and it will load users in that direction respectfuly. In Threshold challenge scenario, if the user clicks on a specific level/base it will limit the list to that level/base only.
Gets participants list for a threshold challenge. Grouped By Levels/Bases with the ability to filter out participants of a certain level.

data.description: Automated example on the right is not supported. Must be a JSON object, under a form field "data", with the following properties:

attachType.description:
"profileIcon", 
"banner", 
"userAttachment", 
"welcomeMessage" - attachTo 1 - parq form 2 - waiver 3 - pdf1 4 - pdf2, 
"messageAttachment" - threadID, 
"messageVideoAttachment" - threadID, 
"messageThumbnailAttachment" - threadID, 
"massMessageAttachment" - senderUserID, 
"massMessageVideoAttachment" - senderUserID, 
"massMessageThumbnailAttachment" - fileID, 
"dailyAutoMessage" - dailyMessageID, 
"storePlanImage" - plan ID, 
"mealPlan" - userID, 
"workoutVideo" -  video workout ID for closeCaption file, 
"mealPhoto" - attachTo the dailyNutritionID, mealGuid, size in the metaData, 
"foodPhoto" - attachTo foodId, 
"mealTemplateMedia" - atachTo the mealTemplateId, only for uploading the meal video thumbnail, 
"externalProductGroupMediaPlan" - attaching the mealplan to the external product group

intervalTime.description: [integer] 0, (this is time allocated for this item, in seconds)

hd.description: [string], If media type is "image", use thumbnailUrl for the images
[string], If media type is "image", use thumbnailUrl for the images

dayOfWeeks.description: monday, tuesday, wednesday, thursday, friday, saturday, sunday
monday, tuesday, wednesday, thursday, friday, saturday, sunday

type.description: "website", image, video, link, or facebook tag type

description.description: Trainerize is a powerful personal training software designed to help you reach more clients with online training, meal planning, messaging, and workout tracking.

modified.description: For group/system level meal templates only

isInUse.description: In there any client subscribed to program

height.description: in inch or cm, depending unitHeight

unitBodystats.description: "cm", "inches" (anything settings, prefix with settings) inherits from signedIn user if null

unitDistance.description: "km", "miles", inherits from signedIn user if null

unitWeight.description: "kg", "lbs", inherits from signedIn user if null

RemindMe.description: like 8am, 9pm or Off, defaults to 10am iif null

level.description:
0 - regular trainer 
 10 - super trainer [not implemented] 
 20 - admin (sees everyone, change any setting other than billing) 
 30 - owner (all unlocked - can change biling)

trainerID.description: returned only if this user is a client

skypeEnabled.description: if group plan = free, false; else true

threadID.description: Thread ID for receive all messages
